mapper.select: SELECT c.id as id, ud.surname as surname_user_data, ud.first_name as first_name_user_data, ud.patronymic as patronymic_user_data, com.name as company_name FROM communit.clients c inner join communit.user_data_view ud on c.user_data_id = ud.user_data_id inner join communit.companies com on c.company_id = com.id WHERE c.id = ?;

SELECT c.id as id, ud.surname as surname_user_data, ud.first_name as first_name_user_data, ud.patronymic as patronymic_user_data, com.name as company_name FROM communit.clients c inner join communit.user_data_view ud on c.user_data_id = ud.user_data_id inner join communit.companies com on c.company_id = com.id WHERE ud.email = ?;

SELECT c.id as id, ud.surname as surname_user_data, ud.first_name as first_name_user_data, ud.patronymic as patronymic_user_data, com.name as company_name FROM communit.clients c inner join communit.user_data_view ud on c.user_data_id = ud.user_data_id inner join communit.companies com on c.company_id = com.id WHERE (ud.surname || ' ' || ud.first_name || ' ' || COALESCE(ud.patronymic, '')) like '%' || ? || '%';
